name: Mild Guacamole
description:
For Full Recipe ~ Use QR Code 


Recipe & Photos By: Dr. Akala Lemus, D.C.
8/30/2018


Ingredients:

1 large ripened avocado
1/2 cup diced cherry tomatoes
1/4 cup chopped cilantro
3 Tbsp finely diced red onion (optional)
1 Tbsp fresh lime juice
1/4 tsp smoked paprika
(1/8 tsp) salt & pepper to taste
								         
Method:

1. Add all ingredients to a bowl and mix until well combined. 

2. Add to the top of your favorite dish, or serve with your favorite chip!
